page.title: 05MY MAY DAY HOLIDAY
page.content: I woke up at 8a.m. and went downstairs to watch T.V.I dressed at about 8.30 and had a breakfast of cornflakes.At 9.30 we all got in the car and visited an antique fair on the Tuxedo Princess,a ship moored on the River Tyne in Newcastle.I bought some coins for my collection. Later in the day we visited Tanfield Railway and rode on an old steam train then bought some mementoes.We watched some rock climbers at the nearby Causey Arch for a while then returned home at about 5.30 p.m. We had a big tea of steak and vegetables. I later helped my dad in the garden,then cleaned out the fish tank with my sister.I read a book for an hour,then had supper before going to bed at 10 p.m.
